question: Posted By Sandra on September 20, 1998 at 19:48:17:57 year old male had right hip replaced January 1998.  Since operation lower back has been sore.  A few months after hip replacement, all toes on both feet began tingling and are sensitive.  Doctors tried water pills--didn't help.  Also tested for diabetes--negative.  MRI done in August 1998 showed a pinched nerve in lower back.  As of now, all ten toes are still stilling tingling and tingling has spread to small fingers on both hands.  Doctors are puzzled.  Any ideas?
title: Ten toes tingling and two fingers
